website_summaries.verdict: The X950G series is an excellent smart TV for the living room, as its display and features deliver a superior picture and sound quality for gaming, listening to music, and watching stunning 4K content.
pros: Smart TV powered by Android TV
Full-Array Local Boosting dynamically alters light levels for noticeably darker and brighter scenes as needed
X-Wide Angle allows for a crystal-clear image, no matter where you sit
cons: The price skyrockets alongside the screen size

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a better tv but it’s plagued with pixel problems audio is decent picture quality is good I loved the design, but overall I was disappointed I hope this helps some of you out.
customer_reviews.author: JAVIER J VEGA

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for TV. 2 star for Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for TV. 2 star for Amazon. I really like the TV. I am disappointed with Amazon however. The price for the TV was lowered by 600 during the return period for my purchase. I asked Amazon to refund the difference but was notified that I would need to return the TV and reorder for this to be done. For small items this is fine but for a 75 inch TV it is terribly inconvenient since it is wall mounted. I opted out of returning and reordering but thought I would share my experience for others.
customer_reviews.author: Bartt

customer_reviews.title: Great tv!
customer_reviews.text: Color is excellent, picture quality is excellent. Depth is the picture is great. The only negative is the remote control does not light up in the dark. This Tv was bought to replace a Samsung that went bad after a year. I have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great set but UPS handling was marginal.
customer_reviews.text: Liked every thing about the set and the packaging which survived the UPS handling . The UPS driver apologized for the beat up condition of the container. The handling instructions are displayed on the top only. I recommend SONY Identifying the sides be marked with large up arrows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon reception
customer_reviews.text: TV died after using it for less than 1 hour. TV lost power and now the power indicator is flashing red and will not power back on. Called Sony customer service and I have to wait another 5-7 business days before I receive another one if I don't decide to just return it and never buy Sony again. Extremely disappointed with this experience, I have never purchased a defective electronic device in my life. Extremely pissed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rivera S Foster

customer_reviews.title: RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
customer_reviews.text: We installed it the day after Christmas came home tonite ... 3 days later ... turned on the new TV and out of the blue, no TV, just Sony logo, four psychedelic circles, turns off ... Sony logo, four psychedelic circles, turns itself off ... repeat ... repeat ... after an hour of research turns out need to factory reset ... still figuring that out, but at this point ... WHO CARES, IF YOU SET OUT TO MAKE A PRODUCT MORE IRRITATING YOU COULDN’T DO IT BETTER... worst part, frustrations on this “feature” are all over the web ... now you tell us, Sony & Google!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the brand that makes you feel good.  Buy the features you can see or hear.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Sony XBR models. For me I know this is best Sony can do at this price point. Are there better Sony models or Brand X models? Yes. But do I want to spend a $1,000 or more for OLED or 8K models? No I do not. So for me the Sony XBR X950G 65 TV provides me all the bang for the buck I need. I have also added a pair of Swan M300 speakers to round out the sound system. Now I have a great TV picture with great sound system for TV, Music, Movies.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS KOERNER

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Panasonic 65 inch with the Sony 85 inch in our media room. It is by far the best TV image quality and brightness than we have ever owned.Sony has done a great job with this 950 model
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Technical Issues
customer_reviews.text: The TV started having issues requiring a factory reset three weeks after receiving a brand new device. It's occurred three times to date. Customer service is offering to replace, but the added hassle of taking off work for weekday delivery, repackaging the product, working with support, and setting up a new TV is not worth the trouble. This is the first television that has ever given me issues. Edit: Sony replaced it after the first one didn't work, and the new TV's audio stopped working two months later. I will never purchase another Sony television.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally Powers Off
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good TV for everything you want it to be, but it powers off occasionally on its own. Checked all settings and followed all advice online, but it continues to power off once a day at different times. Called Amazon support and they immediately got Sony on a 3-way call. The Sony representative remotely connected to the TV and fixed the problem. Two thumbs up to Amazon and Sony👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once Again, Sony Did Not Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: While on the expensive side for a 55-inch non-OLED tv, I've been a loyal fan of Sony Electronics for some time because of their quality and reliability. This X950G did not disappoint. Great picture right out of the box and an easy set-up. The move up to 4k was well worth it. Hopefully I will get the years of reliable service I've gotten from my other Sony products, but so far so good. Amazon's shipping was quick and the box arrived in good shape. This Sony is the way to go, especially if you don't like to fiddle with picture settings and want to just set it up and watch tv.
customer_reviews.author: VTGlideRider

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off on its own
customer_reviews.text: This is connected to a Sony STR-DN1080 receiver. They will shut off on their own every couple of days. Sony's advice is to unplug them for 60 seconds. This doesn't make a difference. Picture quality isn't as good as my old 65 inch Sony. Next purchase will be Samsung QLED or LG OLED.
customer_reviews.author: David Carl

customer_reviews.title: great tv/still suffers from light bleed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture and color unless watching a movie with bars, the light bleeds through the picture and into black portion of the screen making them see grey.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT TV NEW. FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: PLUGGED IT IN AND TURNED IT ON WORKED FOR 30 MINS. THEN SHUTOFF. WENT THRU ALL THE TROUBLE SHOOTING. NOTHING. CALLED SONY SUPPORT, THEY SAID THEY HAVE HAD A LOT OF AMAZON TV'S WITH TROUBLE. SENDING A REPAIR MAN WITH NEW TV TO HOOK UP AND TAKE BAD ONE. FIRST TIME I HAVE EVER HAD ANYTHING WRONG FROM AMAZON. HOPE IT'S THE LAST
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing and quality is the best I have ever seen. You will not go wrong with this TV!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT picture, Lots of adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without any damage to box ! Came by freight truck, not UPS. Delivered inside my house. I prefer SONY, and this one is nice. I DID have to go into the settings, to turn ON the HDR ! ! Then you have tremendous ability, to adjust the picture to your preference. THEN Go back in Settings and LOCK them, to prevent accidental changes.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps 65

customer_reviews.title: Has issues, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'd really like to return this TV. The picture quality is good, although there are definitely some halos in the corners when the screen is dark, but my main issue with the TV is that I constantly need to perform a hard reset through the settings menu. If I don't do this, my streaming services like YouTube TV constantly freeze up within seconds of accessing them. For some reason, turning off the TV doesn't fix this. I'm getting super annoyed have to hard reset every time I turn on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Sony still has the best picture.
customer_reviews.text: I dont care what the other TV companies say, walk into a store that has all the TVs hooked up to a good signal and Sony will stand out. Some places will put the good signal on the TV they are trying to get rid of or on sale. No regrets and the remote is even easier to use than the previous model and has a nicer feel. Awesome on the wall so what are you waiting for? Buy Sony!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Sony is back!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this my tv yesterday. This is my first 4k tv and definitely enjoying the picture and sound quality. I like the whole android UI interface on this TV. It is fast and works great. One thing that will complete this tv for me is to have apple airplay on this. Does anyone know when is Sony going to do a system upgrade to enable airplay 2 on this TV? I really that feature so bad. This tv is compatible to support that. Does anyone know when is the airplay 2 feature coming out on this TV?
customer_reviews.author: Shahriar Kabir

customer_reviews.title: TV doesn't work reliably, poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I paused the TV the WIFI would cut out, but continuous playback was fine. I didn't have this issue with any other device on my network or with my Roku. I called technical support and they refused to acknowledge that this was TV defect (likely software bug for Android TV). I was happy to collect network logs, but they didn't care. I'll be returning this TV as they refuse to have it work correctly. I also hit multiple basic app errors that required a restart for it to work (ex. apps would be mute until restarting). Save yourself some time and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Price, You're Really Stretching If You Find an Issue With It
customer_reviews.text: Picture is amazing, can barely tell its not an Oled. Very bright picture, big, but not intimidating in size. Great remote, superb build quality. Most importantly, same processor and innards as Sony's highest end models. As best as it gets in this price range. I have no idea where negative comments are coming from, unless they paid $3500+ for this model?
customer_reviews.author: Pokey Poke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: There were 2 choices for me when buying 75 inch at mid level price range Sony X950g or Samsung Q8 series, i decided to go with X950 and it is pretty good. Pros: Video Quality is amazing, Default sound from TV without soundbar is decent for such a big TV Software is very responsive. Cons: There are still some software bugs, when I switch between apps sometimes the audio gets cut off and i have to turn the tv off and on to get it working. If you are mounting it is ok, but if you are thinking of putting on media cabinet make sure it is long one the legs extents till end of the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sai Perumala

customer_reviews.title: A really good TV
customer_reviews.text: For me it's almost perfect. The picture quality, the Android operating system and the speed of opening applications all make this TV really nice! The odd thing is that the remote control has two capabilities. It uses IR to turn the TV and sound on and off and Bluetooth to operate it systems. It cannot do both at the same time. So, my soundbar which operates on IR can't be used, along with the TV without shutting the Bluetooth feature off. Then I can't use the controller to operate the applications and other functions.
customer_reviews.author: REDtoniX

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, But...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great (as Sony always is) but instructions are truly lacking. Keeps wanting to switch to external speakers which I have, but have not hooked up yet. It also likes to shut down to the satellite default when watching something which I haven't figured out why yet. TVs have become as/more complicated than a computer! Just haven't had the time to mess with it further yet.
customer_reviews.author: June B

customer_reviews.title: Sony 950g is not good
customer_reviews.text: Sony is good brand but 950g model is not so good because it's have off white and grayish, so thats why I not like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very "smart"
customer_reviews.text: Apparently its not a "smart" tv. It says it connects to a home network but doesn't. It also will not connect to a pc or an android phone - even though its an android tv. I just spent hours trying to play a video from my phone. It will "pair" but then doesn't do anything after that. I just spent another hour with Sony support and he confirmed that you cannot cast anything from your phone to the tv. My 5 year old Mitsubishi can, but this Sony CANNOT
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Android TV OS is unreliable, bad wifi connections and glitchy picture at times
customer_reviews.text: Use this mainly for streaming apps (netflix, prime, disney, etc.). The android tv OS sucks royally. i am constantly unplugging the thing because it has frozen or dropped the wifi connection, even though it says it is connected. great looking tv, but they need to make some updates. for as expensive as this tv is, the OS really lets it down. very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, missing pieces inside box.
customer_reviews.text: The TV is fantastic, apparently I bought a floor model or refurbished one because my tv was missing pieces and I literally searched everything for about 15 minutes, after realizing it was missing pieces I had to drive to the store and buy replacement screws, which you guessed it, aren't a good fit at all. I will never ever make big ticket purchases ever again from Amazon, EVERRRR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Freezing Problem
customer_reviews.text: Streaming from my laptop or playing a recorded video from a DVR will either stop ("pause") audio or video for up to 5 seconds every few minutes. Swapping HDMI cables and swapping any and all of the HDMI inputs does not solve the problem. When the problem occurs, rewinding and playing again shows that the previous "spot" where it stopped, now plays on through the same scene normally! This is apparently not a cable or device problem or it would repeat pausing at the same spot as before. This does not occur when watching TV directly. It only happens when using any of the HDMI connections.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: So one of the things that I really look for in a TV or display in general is performance. I play a lot of games in HDR and how a TV handles is important to me in the long run. Before using this TV, I used the Acer Predator X27 and felt its setting was too aggressive. In games like Final Fantasy 15 for instance, night time scenes would have huge blooming around HUD elements and lights. While blooming still occurs here, the X1 Ultimate chip handles it better with its fewer dimming zones as it more intelligently handles brightness. I also noticed a lot less color banding in games like The Witcher 3, where the sky can have issues.
customer_reviews.author: jolly jared

customer_reviews.title: System crashes once a day
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture but it frequently crashes requiring a power reset
customer_reviews.author: music fan

customer_reviews.title: BEST TV I have ever got Sony X950G
customer_reviews.text: The Sony X950G is really a top of the line TV. I got the 75 inch TV but was afraid it would be too large but it is just fine. The image quality is so good that the large TV is just so naturally beautiful. Its great in bright room as well as in a dark room. The black is very black or at least black enought that I couldn't tell. Very very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anikko

customer_reviews.title: Surprise!! DOA
customer_reviews.text: Arrived doa. Returning asap. Styrofoam at top was badly damaged and split in half. No wonder the packaged arrived doa.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: The sound randomly shuts off
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't purchased this TV. The sound randomly shuts off. To turn the sound back on, I need to unplug it and plug it back in. Also, the remote doesn’t light up so we are constantly fumbling with it and pressing the wrong keys. It’s fine besides that. I don’t love that it’s connected to google, but since google already knows everything about me and my family, I grudgingly live with it. I called Amazon customer service about the issue, but they were unable to help (they told me to reset to factory settings!!).
customer_reviews.author: SSH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: While I love the picture and absolute ease of set up it's the sound quality that amazing for a tv/ I've always had a sound bar, but will probably not get one for this tv. Try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Best television images I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure the the 4k Blu-ray discs are all that cost-effective since the upscaling of the standard Blu-ray discs is superb. It may be that my vision is not sufficiently acute to allow me to discriminate. But, the images from both formats is stunning. I'm not sure that 3D would be any better. Bravia integration with cable box, sony disc player, and 4k capable sony receiver is seamless and one remote functional.
customer_reviews.author: SuperCoder

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but.....
customer_reviews.text: Has an awesome picture and features. Better than other well known brand I owned previous to this. However there are 2 issues that keep me from giving highest rating. One is that the streaming apps built in disconnect too often and I have to unplug and plug in the TV more often than should be necessary. Sony needs to fix this. Also while the remote is awesome it won't control my older Yamaha sound system so I had to use a Logitech Harmony remote to have an easy all in one solution.
customer_reviews.author: Pennerok

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the 65" Sony 950G I purchased. Out of the box, the picture was excellent; after messing around with the menu settings and adjusting to my tastes, it is incredibly good. The upconversion works very well and the black levels are the best I've ever seen on a non-OLED television. It does take some time to learn/understand the menu structure, but once you've got it down, things can be adjusted quite easily. Overall, it's a great tv that I've been watching happily for several months now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the negative comments about this TV. Im going to assume they didn't bother to tamper with the picture settings. Everything is crisp, clear, and the colors look amazing. For gaming it does a great job. Low input lag and it looks stunning. Just be sure to switch the picture mode to GAME mode for the lowest input lag. I had 0 issues setting up this TV. Connected it to my wi-fi and in seconds I was online. Updated the firmware with ease and signed into my streaming apps. This is by far the best TV I have ever owned. I would high recommend this TV to anyone within this budget.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Sony is the bst
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sony that was only 1.5 years old - it was wonderful but we accidentally splashed a bit of tea on the screen and it got weird vertical lines on the screen. I replaced it with this one and I was happy to find that it had built-in feature for Alexa devices (I have 7). Now I can turn it on or off from any room (did not have to get a smart plug). Sound is good. No one will go near it with ice tea.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This TV is absolutely amazing. The picture is top notch. Has all the apps I want so I could get rid of my smart TV devices. I can also use the Steam Link app to play games from my computer on the TV. It has Bluetooth to connect any Xbox One controller. Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Brown

customer_reviews.title: No Video, Only Sound, Used or Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I feel scammed. They sold a refurbished TV as a brand new TV. This TV had no video at all, it only had sound. Couldn't even set up anything on the TV. The screen was completely blacked-out. I have never had a TV in all my years of life that had no video and was defective out of the box. A close examination of the TV shows that it's used or refurbished TV that they sold as a brand new TV. Thank God, Amazon helped me to return this nonsense back. I hope they, the seller, redeem their reputation if they care, else, I will ask for my money back. This is so frustrating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Afam

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, poor performance, can’t get dark
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what the local area dimming is supposed to refer to. When there are bright and dark levels near each other the blacks get blown out like my 10 year old $300 tv. Even when the screen is completely dark it isn’t black. The contrast is so poor the brightness needs to be turned almost all the way up. I wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Great visual awful sound issues
customer_reviews.text: We love the picture quality. Chose this over OLED because work brightness. Out issue is with the sound. Not very compatible with sound systems. It recognizes our sound system but only works about 5% of the time and never with our gaming consoles. Never had this problem with any of our other TVs. Even more annoyingly, the TV speakers will randomly stop working, so we're left with not sound from either source. Unplugging the TV and restarting it sometimes helps. All in all I expected better for the amount of money we spent. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Many flaws.  Streaming is very poor.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th Sony. I'm an all Sony home. What a HUGH disappointment with this TV. Picture is great but the streaming feature is awful. Streaming video drops out. Sound sometimes doesn't start or drops out requiring me to turn off and in a couple of occasions I had to pull the power cord. NEEDS software fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: avoid android tv, ruins this product
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great, Android TV is terrible. Go ahead and buy this if you don't mind your TV rebooting while streaming netflix, pauses and jerks that repeat during streaming (FOX, HBO and Amazon) until you reboot, etc. If I had it to do over again, I'd just by a TV and hook up a roku, actually, I think I'll do that w/ this TV. Unacceptable for $1000+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I wanted in a TV
customer_reviews.text: First I bought a LG C9 OLED TV that was soooo much more expensive - but I had to return it, because it was skipping frames in movies, everything looked like in a Soap Opera, the remote was a piece of work.... SO I decided to go with this Sony TV. And I couldn't be happier. It has an excellent image quality out of the box, I don't have to study, in order to make it work for me. The remote control feels premium. This is what I wanted. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the TV picture and build quality. I love the Android TV and the built-in Chromecast feature. The response rate to the remote is excellent. It is compatible with YouTube TV app and that was very important to me. The delivery was fast and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality is Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a beautiful picture, with superior screen brightness and detail. The remote control is very easy to use, and the Android OS with many apps works flawlessly. The TV was easy to set up and adjust to my preferences. I use it for watching cable TV, streaming from Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Now, and several other apps. Games with my Nintendo Switch really pop on the screen. Very happy so far within purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy set up. Multiple ports for many devices. Can't go wrong with SONY. Only issue was not with SONY but with delivery. Luckily I was watching for the delivery. Truck pulled up & took so long I went to take the dogs out & came back in & no package. Looked on the porches of houses next to me & there it was. Had to carry it from their porch to my house. Best advice keep an eye out for delivery notification.
customer_reviews.author: StlouisCards#13

customer_reviews.title: good to know after all the research it turned out the was I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at websites and reading reviews for months. On on comparison site, I was looking at the differences between the 950g and the 900f and the Samsung and it said, at this level of TV they are all great, just go with what works best for you and your budget. So I wanted the best sound quality in that price range and saw the 950g had the best rating and pulled the trigger. I am happy with my TV it looks and sounds great. no remorse at all. since 1995 I have had 4 TVs, all SONY and have been happy with them all.
customer_reviews.author: Dacks

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV!!!  Remember to upgrade your HDMI cables.  Lol
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Unboxing it was easy, no box cutters needed. Picture quality is awsome. Quality of the parts are impressive. Metal frame not plastic. Legs stands are metal too. Just remember to get the right 4k HDMI cables if you want to get best picture quality from this TV. This is a really great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it much since it's used as the display TV in our living room, but so far, so good. Excellent picture quality and color, easy to hook up and set up. I always have good luck with the Sony models.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Needs more dimming zones.
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming TV I’ve ever used. Movies it’s just ok. The problem with this TV is the lack of dimming zones. Yes there is blooming when gaming and most movies. But the depth, contrast and detail is far better than any tv. Unfortunately with only 60 dimming zones it’s a bad TV for night time viewing. Hers hoping Sony puts 100+ dimming zones in the next years model.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: 55" inch
customer_reviews.text: Having looked at a few TV in this size range......IT'S GREAT! BEST 55" I'VE SEEN....and I shopped for a years before buying. Only problem is the price but for what you get for it made up for it. I haven't had access to a LG to test out the apps you can load on the TV, BUT this one give you Google store access and others. You can stream anything, even DC Universe. Picture is better than all the ones I a saw in the Class. Sound system, Soundbar or Powered Speakers (I use Klispch R-41PM ) are a must for small TV's ......SO i DON'T KNOW WHAT THE SOUND QUALITY IS LIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Would not turn on past the startup screen. Yellow line down the side. Return process with amazon is a NIGHTMARE.
customer_reviews.author: Will Butler

customer_reviews.title: No Alexa App With This TV
customer_reviews.text: After 3 hours with 4 Amazon Technical Representatives, the answer seems to be this TV may not be compatible with Alexa. Or, Alexa may not be compatible with this Sony TV. ARE YOU KIDDING ME! False advertising??? How can this description of this TV say it's compatible with Alexa? One of the reasons I bought this TV was for picture quality. Yep! Great Picture Quality. But, Sony says this tV is Alexa compatible. NOT! I want my money back. How do you return a Sony 65 inch HDTV? So sorry. I had high expectations. Not frustratIon. Thanks to Amazon's technical support staff. The BEST. Great company. Not so good advertising claims. $1,300 later.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert R. Martini, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Sony wins again
customer_reviews.text: I've had my new SONY X950G 65TV 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV for 3 weeks now & we love all that there is about it. The picture quality is super. We like the android capabilities & all the extra features of Smart. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DALE D. CONNER

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture quality for an LED TV
customer_reviews.text: I viewed on youtube a unpackaging and setup video and when my TV arrived it took less than 40 minutes from in the door, unpacking and the complete setup of the TV. Picture quality exceeded my expectations. The only issue I have found was that once the cable box was setup with the remote that when you bring up the guide there is no page down or page up button. This makes it hard moving thru the guide one line at a time. Setting up the apps and access was easy. Love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: David L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My Best TV
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best TVs I has seen, apart from the fact that he has to link his Google account, everything works excellent, I used applications such as YouTube, Netflix, Fox Play and HBOGO and they work excellent. To have a super sharp image, I recommend following the suggestions on the website rtings.com
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Rondon

customer_reviews.title: It's a Sony Bravia
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality on this TV is amazing, after owning a 46" Sony Bravia this is a huge upgrade. I highly recommend this Sony. I was looking into a Sony oled but the price difference was about $600 so I decided to go with this and I don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good
customer_reviews.text: So my replacement came and I carefully put it together. Right away, when I started to set it up, this process went more smoothly and simply. So far, great picture, I love the life-like pictures. One word of caution, I had problems with youtube.com and sound. I remember that when I received the tv, that there were search titles already on app to the right. It makes me wonder if at factory level, person was watching the tv, youtube, and who knows what else happened, but that app was hacked or something. Grateful for my new tv. If I had that again on youtube, or any else app, I would send it back right away.
customer_reviews.author: BuddhaLady

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this TV after a lot of research and I couldn’t be happier. The picture quality is utterly astonishing. It replaces a 10 year old Sony Bravia that has served me well. Set up was intuitive and very easy. I would highly recommend this product to anyone that values a good picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gionti III

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV!
customer_reviews.text: No TV can beat the picture quality of this TV. Not even close!! This TV has a built in chrome cast and yes there are some issue with casting from phone for few apps but hey that can be easily avoided using external chrome cast device which can be plugged in to the TV.I didn’t buy sound bar as TV has a decent build in speakers. I am using this TV for a month now and Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PUSHKAR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture! ZERO complaints. Had a Lg Oled before this tv... lasted a year (screen burn), this Sony is way better. It's so bright. The apps menus are very fast and easily customizable. Originally got the vizio m series quantum I returned it because it was so slow, nearly unusable. There's no way you'll be disappointed with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy unpacking and set-up, and excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was very impressed with how well this TV was packaged. The box and padding were sturdy, and thoughtfully designed so that one can easily take apart and remove the cardboard and styrofoam without physical strain or risk to the TV. Set-up is straightforward. The picture quality is great, and the available apps have allowed me to disconnect my Roku. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing TV. After using Samsung for 5 years went back to Sony. The picture quality is absolutely amazing. If you are looking to spent $$ on a 65 inch 4K tv,, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sam

customer_reviews.title: Sony knows
customer_reviews.text: Sony knows how to process images. The color rendition is outstanding, there is no motion blur. I would buy again, zero issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: The stevies awesome it just has its quirks and issues with software and firmware issues
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing and the picture is spot on. My only issue is that it has a small scratch on the screen..But now over the course of a week I've noticed it has a slight flickering effect to it. So I decided to reset the tv but it continues to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: chris gray

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and friendly home page, much better than Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a god price
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound quality. Wall mounted it, and we're very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Al H. in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great tv with earc issue
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tv with great picture and love the many features! My only complaint is that I have a constant audio drop when streaming its native apps, disney plus, netflix, etc, through earc to my marantz 1510 reciever that also has earc. Ive tried many settings changed hdmi cables (audioquest chocolate currently) rebooted the tv and reciever to no avail. The audio drop happens at least 30 times in a hour period. Im hoping there is an audio update to fix the issue. Other than the audio problem I love the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 49" Samsung from walmart the cable tech opened the box and set it up. It had horizontal and vertical lines in the screen. Watched it for a couple days until I could return it. The sony 55 came and was so much more pleasant design and performance, picture and sound quality than the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Great picture, not too heavy either compared to some others the features are great, lots of help for me being new to android tv's, setup was easy and well its a sony so it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: great picture, not so great interface
customer_reviews.text: Had to 'hard reset' (unplug) several times (ongoing) to correct issues with the "app" functionality due to loss of audio. We have Charter/Spectrum cable TV, and while TV pared with the cable box ok, we need to change the channel with the cable TV remote one time after turning on the TV in order for the TV remote to work, odd? for the price, expected a more robust OS...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hinch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: TV continuously needs to be reset using the SONY Smart TV. Eventually bought a Fire Stick to get around issues.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: small spotlights
customer_reviews.text: I really like the TV. It is very bright so I usually turn the brightness way down. There is light leakage and blooming but the overall picture is very good. My primary issue is that when the image leaves bars at the top and bottom there are two very bright LEDs that look like small spotlights on the top bar, which is very distracting. I would guess that the LEDs should have been behind the bezel which would hide the spot light effect. SONY: PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THIS IS TYPICAL.
customer_reviews.author: WMR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace my old Samsung 2012, Wuao!! The resolution and quality of image is Awesome. When is show HD image is perfect, when is show 4k image is hallucinatory. Is 100% recomendable TV for every one.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo Zacarias

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: The Sony X950G is worth every penny, a premium LED LCD television with outstanding picture quality. My only critique would be in a pitch black room and having a dark scene you can see a slight blooming when you have a bright image. Otherwise everything is amazing, motion, color, contrast and detail. Android OS works like a charm, the X1 Ultimate Processor does its job on making the TV run smooth. Out of the box the calibrations are very good, of course you can always modify the settings to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, easy set-up.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Replaced a QLED which was flickering after 2 years. It was an easy unpack and set-up. I did it without help. Turned it on, went thru the set-up and it started working. Great picture and it has been working fine since I bought it. Unfortunately, these newer TV's do not last as long as their predecessors. I hope I can get a couple of years from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Etem Dolen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic care during shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Sure, I will re-write my review to better fit into Amazon's policies. In other words, do not write what they do not want to hear. I love this TV! It is amazing and I did a lot of research before pulling the trigger. Too bad I didn't get to enjoy it. This TV was shipped from WA state to PA via UPS. Genius idea. It seems it was stabbed with a forklift and then kicked several times at every location it stopped on the way. The result is self-explanatory - cracked screen and a return, followed by a trip to local Best Buy to buy something that is delivered with care.
customer_reviews.author: FV

customer_reviews.title: No Support
customer_reviews.text: HDMI port 1 stopped working after 2 months. Couldn't get any support to fix this. Just gave me the run around from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal supporter of Sony but disappointed with this one. Pros: The picture quality is excellent. Cons: The volume will stop working at times- you have to turn off the tv- wait awhile, turn the tv back on and then the volume will return. The internet connection is spotty. At times I cannot log on to you tube yet I can get into Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi H.

customer_reviews.title: sound intermittent
customer_reviews.text: Had TV for 2 days when the sound would cut out for 1 to 2 secs. Tried reset from Sony -- that didn't work -- Amazon is replacing TV
customer_reviews.author: 983pl

customer_reviews.title: Best picture bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Love it awesome picture setting are about perfect right out the box. Regular TV programs never looked so clear on TV. Vivid mode is the best to watching everything. wired internet connection is the best
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great tv!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Great picture and colors. Only problem is direct sun. But against this is just small problem. Overall this is excellent tv. Renewed remote looks better than before. Since I ordered 55inch now I’m thinking update my bigger one and get 65 or 75 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Gave to my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I was spoiled by my LG Oled in the Den. Ordered this for the Living Room and while it was okay I was used to the Oled so I gave this to one of my daughters and ordered another Oled. If you are used to LCD screens I believe this Sony is a very good one. Just depends on your personal tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: Very good value except for the legs
customer_reviews.text: While the size is much too large for an apartment master bedroom, the quality is superb as it is to be expect with Sony which is a brand I’ve associated with since age 4. The down side is: This TV comes with legs to help stand the tv in say an entertainment center, dresser, etc. These legs are a ROYAl PAIN in the heiny to install. Much so, I opted not to use them resting the tv on the dresser and towards the wall which is a risk. The remote has a built in mic which picks up your voice very well. Update to 10/7/19: it’s excellent and legs hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV for the $
customer_reviews.text: I use an Amazon FireTV for streaming stuff, but now I'm thinking I just might use the Android functionality built into the TV. Overall, we're very happy with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Deal

customer_reviews.title: TV at it’s best
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Clarity is awesome. Delivered as promised. Really sharp pictures.
customer_reviews.author: SadieB

customer_reviews.title: I love the beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture, color, sharpness in high definition. As a senior, the sound system is the only negative quality. Must play loudly in order to hear dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: Sistah Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new smart TV. Was torn between 65” and 55”. Due to location we went with the 55”. Great picture looking forward to dumping cable and start streaming. I have always beers Sony fan. and still am
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: The volume on this tv does not work properly!!At first it was ok but now it goes up and down on its own!!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tv, but one size too big for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tv —all the positive reviews I’ve read are fully justified. I just wish it was available in a 49 inch version. In the end, I decided to return it and purchased the 49-inch Sony x900f instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Portman

customer_reviews.title: I've always been a Sony fan!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a Sony fan but this has knocked my socks off. Super high quality, the 4 k is awesome! I can always count on Sony for the best of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture
customer_reviews.text: The Sony TV provides an excellent HD picture. The picture is very bright with vibrant colors. It also provides other options for entertainment via WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hartner

customer_reviews.title: TV is Pretty, pretty, pretty, pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This tv is great. I've seen good and bad reviews but I'll shoot straight. The picture is awesome and the speakers were not bad, even though I bypassed them for av system. Unless you are looking for issues, I was able to find none. Looks great with ps4, and streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Karrah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Best tv I've ever owned.Easy to set up,best picture,and brightest colors of any flat panel set by far.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Mainly Used for Xbox Gaming and Streaming...Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is massive and AWESOME. Being a Sony fanboy, this model did not disappoint. I run my Hulu, Netflix and Kodi, it does not pixelate or become grainy through any of these platforms. My best TV so far, I highly recommend this Awesome piece of modern technology.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: replaced an old Bravia
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Bravia I had from previous times. Great images.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

product_meta.title: Sony XBR-55X950G 55" (3840 x 2160) Bravia 4K Ultra High Definition Smart LED TV
product_meta.description: Size:55-Inch| Style:TVUnlock the world of ultimate colors and contrast with the X950G 4K HDR TV from Sony. Incredibly clear 4K HDR picture quality is powered by the Picture Processor X1 Ultimate, and content has never been brighter than with Full Array Local Dimming & Boosting. X Motion Clarity technology makes action scenes look like real life. The power consumption (operation) is 235 watts while in stand by mode the power consumption is 0.5 watts.
feature_bullets: HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE: Experience incredible detail, brightness and clarity with 4K UHD resolution
X-WIDE ANGLE: Sit anywhere in the room to enjoy incredible real-world color with the 85inch X950G
IMMERSIVE AUDIO: Acoustic Multi-Audio syncs sound with action to create Sound-from Picture Reality
ULTIMATE REALISM: Enjoy clear, vibrant colors with TRILUMINOS Display and 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping
NO MOTION BLUR: Watch lifelike on-screen action with virtually no blur with Motion flow XR technology

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars589 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
